Module io.github.darvil.terminal.textformatter
Package io.github.darvil.terminal.textformatter.color

Class TrueColor

java.lang.Object
io.github.darvil.terminal.textformatter.color.TrueColor
All Implemented Interfaces:
Color
public class TrueColor extends Object implements Color
Represents a true color in the RGB color space.

Note: Support for true color is not universal. Expect this implementation to work in most modern terminals, but not all.

  • Method Details

    • of

      @NotNull public static @NotNull TrueColor of(int r, int g, int b)
      Creates a new TrueColor object with the given RGB components.
      Parameters:
      r - The red component, in the range 0-255.
      g - The green component, in the range 0-255.
      b - The blue component, in the range 0-255.
      Returns:
      A new TrueColor object with the given RGB components.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If any of the color components are not in the range 0-255.
